page.title: 19GENERAL REVIEW
page.content:
POPULATION : APPROXIMATELY 1000 WITH APPROXIMATELY 400 DWELLINGS

GENERAL : 1 CHURCH, 1 PRIVATE CHAPEL, 1 METHODIST CHAPEL. 1 PRIMARY SCHOOL, 1 VILLAGE SHOP WITH A VISITING POST OFFICE 3 TIMES A WEEK. 3 PUBS ONE WITH ACCOMMODATION

A LOW LYING AREA IN THE THAMES VALLEY ROUGHLY 10 MILES TO THE WEST OF THE CITY OF OXFORD. THE VILLAGE IS A LIVELY COMMUNITY.

THE VILLAGE WAS RECORDED INT THE ORIGINAL DOMESDAY BOOK
